narrative:
*   This is a focused inspection limited to the three dogs cited under veterinary care section 2.40 b 2 as a direct /
repeat noncompliance on the January 12, 2015 inspection report.  The three dogs ( microchip numbers 049 310 608
 /  031 112 538  and 143963765A )  were examined by a licensed veterinarian on January 15, 2015.   Proper
documentation was provided by the licensee.
* The focused inspection and exit conference were conducted with the licensee. 
*  Copy of inspection report was sent by certified and regular mail.
Additional Inspectors
Tygart Michael, Supervisory Animal Care Specialist
